Package org.husky.emed.ch.cda.utils.readers

Class ClinicalDocumentReader

java.lang.Object
org.husky.emed.ch.cda.utils.readers.ClinicalDocumentReader
public class ClinicalDocumentReader extends Object
A reader for CDA-CH-EMED clinical documents.
Author:
Quentin Ligier

  • Constructor Details

    • ClinicalDocumentReader

      public ClinicalDocumentReader(POCDMT000040ClinicalDocument clinicalDocument)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      clinicalDocument - The clinical document.

  • Method Details

    • getDocumentType

      @SideEffectFree public CceDocumentType getDocumentType() throws InvalidEmedContentException
      Returns the type of the CDA-CH-EMED document.
      Returns:
      an instance of CceDocumentType.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the document type IDs cannot be found.

    • getPreValidityStartTime

      @SideEffectFree public Instant getPreValidityStartTime(Instant effectiveTime)
      Returns the starting time of the PRE document. It's the first known time from:
      • The start date of the 'documentationOf' attribute of the PRE document;
      • The creationTime of the document.
      Parameters:
      effectiveTime - The document effective time.
      Returns:
      the inclusive prescription validity start time as an Instant.

    • getPreValidityStopTime

      @SideEffectFree public @Nullable Instant getPreValidityStopTime()
      Returns the ending time of the PRE document. It's the first known time from:
      • The end date of the 'documentationOf' attribute of the MTP document.
      Returns:
      the inclusive prescription validity stop time as an Instant or null.

    • getContentSection

      @SideEffectFree public POCDMT000040Section getContentSection() throws InvalidEmedContentException
      Returns the structured content section in the document.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the section is missing.

    • getNarrativeText

      @SideEffectFree public StrucDocText getNarrativeText()
      Returns the document's narrative text.
      Returns:
      the narrative text as structured text.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the narrative text is missing.

    • getRemarks

      @SideEffectFree public @Nullable StrucDocText getRemarks()
      Returns the content of the remarks section.
      Returns:
      the remarks text or null if it was not provided.

    • getPdfRepresentation

      @SideEffectFree public Optional<byte[]> getPdfRepresentation()
      Returns the original representation as a PDF content, if present. It's decoded from the Base64 scheme.
      Returns:
      an optional that may contain the PDF content as a byte array.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the value is not in valid Base64 scheme.

    • getPatientDigest

      @SideEffectFree public PatientDigest getPatientDigest()
      Returns the digest of the patient.
      Returns:
      the patient digest.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the patient is incomplete.

    • getCustodian

      @SideEffectFree public OrganizationDigest getCustodian()
      Returns the digest of the custodian.
      Returns:
      the custodian digest.
      Throws:
      InvalidEmedContentException - if the custodian is incomplete.

    • getRecipients

      @SideEffectFree public List<@NonNull RecipientDigest> getRecipients()
      Returns the digests of the recipients.
      Returns:
      the recipient digests.
